root.name: vibrate()
root.description: Activates the vibrator of the mobile phone for the specified duration. Returns true if vibration control is available. Vibration control is not available on all mobile phones.

parameter.label: p
parameter.description: Phone: any variable of type Phone

parameter.label: duration
parameter.description: int: duration of vibration, in milliseconds, or 0 to turn off the vibrator
